item.title: The Weekly Debt Restructure Standups That Saved Our Refinance
item.description: Refinancing while restructuring debt can feel like conducting an orchestra with three different sets of sheet music. One section wants lower rates, another wants cash-out funds, and the percussionists (a.k.a. the lenders) keep tapping their pencils waiting for documents. After our first attempt fizzled, we implemented weekly standups inspired by project management playbooks. They lasted 20 minutes, used a shared agenda, and completely changed how we operated.
